MPIMultiEvaluationWrapper module¶

class MPIMultiEvaluationWrapper.MPIMultiEvaluationWrapper¶

Bases: shiva.eval_envs.Evaluation.Evaluation

Manages one or more MPIEvaluations

launch() → None¶

Launches the MultiEvaluationWrapper and grabs Agents to be Evaluated

Returns

None

run() → None¶

Sends Agents to get evaluated, waits for metrics, and ranks them based on the metrics.

Returns

None

get_agents_currently_being_evaluated() → List¶

This function assumes that Agents from same Learner MUST be evaluated together

Returns

List of Agent IDs

has_pair(agent_id, role) → List¶

Checks if agent id has another agent in the same learner so they can play together.

Returns

A list of agent IDs.

get_role(agent_id)¶
get_learner_id(agent_id) → int¶

Returns the learner id that corresponds to passed agent id.

Returns

Integer id representing the learner housing the agent.

get_learner_spec(agent_id) → Dict¶

Returns the specs for that learner containing the agent.

Returns

Dictionary of specifications.

initial_agent_selection()¶

Randomly selects the initial agents to be sent to which environment.

Returns

None

agent_selection(env_rank) → None¶

Randomly selects the agents to be sent to which environment.

Returns

None

close() → None¶

Closes the connection with the MetaLearner. :returns: None

log(msg, to_print=False, verbose_level=- 1) → None¶

If verbose_level is not given, by default will log :param msg: Message to be outputted :param to_print: Whether you want it as print or debug statement :param verbose_level: Level required for the message to be printed.

Returns

None

show_comms() → None¶

Shows who this MultiEvalWrapper is connected to. :returns: None
